sentences: Me tahtsimes teha õhtust sööki koos sõpradega.
Lapsed tahtsid mängida pärast kooli aga meil oli plaan külastada vanemaid.
Nad ei tahtnud minna kinno, sest nad tahtsid pigem kodu jääda.
context: Tahtsime is the first-person plural past indicative form of the Estonian verb 'tahtma', which means 'to want' or 'to wish'. It is used when referring to what a group (including the speaker) wanted in the past. The word combines the meaning of wanting something with the grammatical markers for first person plural ('me' - we) and past tense.
